src:
History of Karnataka in Black & White: An album for Rajyotsava
01 Nov 2019, 00:30 by Bangalore Mirror Bureau
One of India’s earliest photojournalists TS Satyan has captured historic moments in the making of our state and also the anonymous ‘ordinary person’. Here’s a snapshot of Karnataka on Rajyotsava.



.
